Bitcoin ETF Flows Show Negative Trend For First Time Since Launch https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2024/01/25/bitcoin-etf-flows-show-negative-trend-for-first-time-since-launch/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines V2PTQJFJLRAEZGLEHH2TDQGJP4 Helene BraunThe group of recently launched spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) are seeing combined negative flows for the first time since they opened for trade on Jan. 11 as money moving into funds like BlackRock's IBIT and Fidelity's FBTC has failed to keep pace with the exits from Grayscale’s GBTC.
